Short Fuse.name: Short Fuse
Short Fuse.blurb: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
Short Fuse.description: Innate: Ziggs's basic attacks periodically deal 20 − 160 (based on level) (+ 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) AP)  bonus magic damage, doubled to 40 − 320 (based on level) (+ 60 / 80 / 100% (based on level) AP) against structures.
Short Fuse.description2: Ziggs reduces Short Fuse's  cooldown by 4 / 5 / 6 (based on level) seconds whenever he uses an ability.
Short Fuse.notes:
* PENDING FOR TEST: Short Fuse's interaction with  Counter Strike,  Riposte,  Aegis Protection, and  blind.
 Short Fuse will only apply to the primary target if Ziggs has purchased  Runaan's Hurricane.

Bouncing Bomb.name: Bouncing Bomb
Bouncing Bomb.blurb: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
Bouncing Bomb.description: Active: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb to the target area, exploding upon contacting an enemy, the terrain or reaching the end of its trajectory. The bomb can bounce up to twice, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
Bouncing Bomb.description2: When exploding the Bouncing Bomb deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Bouncing Bomb.notes:
* Bouncing Bomb obeys game physics (can be thrown or bounce over units/terrain if there is sufficient air time).
 Bouncing Bomb may go over enemies without exploding (will do so if it lands against walls).
  Spell shield can block both the bomb's impact and its explosion (blocking the former will not prevent the latter).

Satchel Charge.name: Satchel Charge
Satchel Charge.blurb: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
Satchel Charge.description: Active: Ziggs flings an explosive charge towards the target area,  revealing its surroundings, and exploding after 4 seconds or upon reactivation.
Satchel Charge.description2: When exploding the Satchel Charge deals magic damage and  knocks back all surrounding enemies by 250 units. If Ziggs is within the explosion radius, he instead  flies up to 500 units away while taking no damage in the process.
Satchel Charge.description3: Turret Explosion: Satchel Charge's explosion can demolish  turrets below a  percentile health threshold.
Satchel Charge.notes:
* Satchel Charge will explode immediately after landing if reactivated mid-flight.
 Satchel Charge's displacement obeys game physics (distance increases with proximity to the charge, resulting in being knocked straight up when aligned directly on top of it).
 Ziggs will not be displaced by Satchel Charge while  teleporting (will be while  recalling, interrupting it in the process).

Hexplosive Minefield.name: Hexplosive Minefield
Hexplosive Minefield.blurb: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
Hexplosive Minefield.description: Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target area, lasting for up to 10 seconds.
Hexplosive Minefield.description2: Mines explode on contact with an enemy,  slowing them for 1.5 seconds and dealing magic damage. Targets detonating more than one mine take 40% damage from subsequent mines.
Hexplosive Minefield.notes:
* Hexplosive Minefield grants  sight of the target area for a short duration (on-cast and when each mine explodes).
 Each mine applies spell effects as area-of-effect despite dealing single-target damage.
  Spell shield will block a single mine's worth of damage.

Mega Inferno Bomb.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
Mega Inferno Bomb.blurb: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
Mega Inferno Bomb.description: Active: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the  Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it to the target area, granting  sight within a 350 unit radius as it travels.
Mega Inferno Bomb.description2: Upon reaching the target area, it explodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies caught in the blast, increased by 50% in the epicenter.
Mega Inferno Bomb.notes:
* Mega Inferno Bomb can be blocked by  Yasuo's  Wind Wall or  Braum's  Unbreakable only at cast or at a certain angle upon landing.
 Allies cannot see Mega Inferno Bomb's area indicator until shortly before the blast.
 Mega Inferno Bomb takes 3.5 seconds to land when Ziggs casts from maximum range (reduced to 2 seconds when casting point blank).
